Bank bazaar is always fulfills it's commitment which they give to their customers and also from bank bazaar the follow up was there regularly till I received the credit card. I mostly use bank bazaar's mobile application which is user friendly.

I am using SBI credit card from last 2 years, the services provided by SBI credit card is good when compared to all other credit cards. I get good offers like cash back and reward points. I paid an annual fees of Rs 3900 which is nominal. I use this card for shopping purpose and i am also satisfied with the credit limit.

I am using HDFC credit card from last 7 to 8 months, the services provided by HDFC credit card is good when compared to all other credit cards. I get good offers like cash back and reward points. The annual fees which i paid for this card is nominal. I use this card for shopping purpose and i am also satisfied with the credit limit.

I am using Axis bank credit card from last 3 years, the services provided by Axis bank credit card is good when compared to all other credit cards. i get good offers like cash back and reward points. This credit card was for free of cost. I use this card for shopping and paying EB bills. I am also satisfied with the credit limit.

I am using HDFC credit card from last 7 to 8 years, the credit card services are best in HDFC bank. I also get attractive offers like cash back, reward points, EMI options and discounts on online purchase. I am also satisfied with the credit limit which they are giving.

I am using HDFC credit card from last 7 to 8 months, the services provided by HDFC credit card is good when compared to all other credit cards. I get good offers like cash back and reward points. The annual fees which i paid for this card is nominal. I use this card for shopping purpose and i am also satisfied with the credit limit.

I hold STANDARD CHARTER bank's credit card for 10 years . The credit limit was 1.79 lakhs and I hold Manhattan international card. The customer service and responses was really good . The validity of the card is till 2017. Here the interest rate and charges are bit high . I am satisfied with the customer service and responses.

My credit card was taken with CITI bank 10 years back. The credit limit was 2.24 lakhs and I hold master International card . The customer service and responses was satisfactory . The interest rate and chargers are bit high than other banks. They have to improve their online banking system here. My overall experience was not bad.

I do hold Kotak mahindra bank credit card and the response is good one for me. Credit limit value is around seventy thousand Rupees and the mobile application is very good to use, also its really easy to access. Interface is also user friendly.

I am using Bankbazaar.com from the last two months of time.Response is good one for me with them and the customer service is good too. I have not faced any such issues with the Bankbazaar.com till now. Mobile application is also good one with them,

The credit card service is very good with ICICI bank. I hold the ICICI Ferrari credit card for past 3years. I get lots of benefits with the Ferrari credit card. I am not satisfied with the Ferrari credit limit, still they need to improved the credit limit. I pay Rs,450 as annual fee every year .

I recently took a top up personal loan from HDFC Bank. It was again another easy process. I did not have to do much. There was no documentation involved as I am a existing customer. It was quick and easy to get the loan. I have taken a top up for 1.39 Lakhs and the intere

SBI customer service is not good, Number of times I called them but they was no response from their end for any queries. SBI is also taking lot of charges for the credit card transactions. Even their payment gate is also bad and its take long time to reflect the payment.

I got more than 4 products from bajaj finserv consumer durable loan. The customer support response need to be quick and fast from the bajaj finserv consumer durable loan. This loan comes with the No cost EMI and I am satisfied with the bajaj finserv consumer durable loan.

I had a two wheeler insurance policy from the insurer BHARTI AXA GENERAL INSURANCE. I appreciate their customer care services because they intimates me to renew my two wheeler insurance before due date. The service is good and i can recommend their services to my friends.

I have a Bajaj Passion pro bike and found this Insurance from the company itself. For the amount of premium I am paying the coverage are pretty good. The reason I have selected is that both my Bike and Insurance are from the same company which would make claim a lot easier if needed.
